subdisciplines.name: Environmental Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemical and biochemical phenomena that occur in natural places.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Biology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interactions between living organisms and their environment.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Geology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interaction between earth and its surrounding environment.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Sociology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interaction between society and its surrounding environment.
